remarks: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution.  This version has bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Mar-2017.)
statement:
cbvmptf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
cbvmptf.2 $e |- F/_ y A $.
cbvmptf.3 $e |- F/_ y B $.
cbvmptf.4 $e |- F/_ x C $.
cbvmptf.5 $e |- ( x = y -> B = C ) $.
cbvmptf $p |- ( x e. A |-> B ) = ( y e. A |-> C ) $.
$d x y $.
